title: Strengthening AI Practical Skills: Role-Based Project Learning for Collaborative Knowledge Building

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively design mathematical problem-solving strategies through role division (initiator, supporter, argumentator, questioner, challenger, timekeeper)
Learners can analyze mathematical concepts from multiple perspectives through group discussions and organize discussion content into structured documents
Learners can improve the completeness of project deliverables to over 80% by incorporating peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
